detectors.description:
ANDRE.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#21-28) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#24)
	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#25)
detectors.markdown:
[ANDRE.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#L21-L28) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balanceOf[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#L24)
	- [balanceOf[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#L25)

detectors.description:
ANDRE.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#43-55) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#50)
	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#51)
	- allowance[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#52)

detectors.description:
transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ANDRE.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#21-28)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ANDRE.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ANDRE.sol#34-41)
